meanings.definition: In a diligent or careful manner.
meanings.sent1: She worked studiously on her homework, making sure to check every answer.
meanings.sent2: He studied studiously for the exam, reviewing his notes multiple times.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel watched studiously as the acorn fell from the tree, ready to pounce.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted studiously, each brushstroke adding depth to the masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The detective examined the crime scene studiously, looking for any clues.

meanings.definition: With great attention to detail or effort.
meanings.sent1: The chef cooked studiously, ensuring each dish was perfectly seasoned.
meanings.sent2: She listened studiously to the lecture, taking notes on every important point.
meanings.sent3: The cat observed studiously as the mouse scurried across the room, plotting its next move.
meanings.sent4: The gardener tended to the plants studiously, pruning and watering with care.
meanings.sent5: The student read the textbook studiously, absorbing every bit of information.
